title: Front-End
text: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with alot of experience in using React, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap. Experienced in leveraging various libraries and npm packages. Capable of working with APIs.

title: Back-End
text: well-versed in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. With a strong grasp of authentication protocols. Skillful in organizing code through the implementation of efficient routes, controllers, and models.

title: Networking
text: strong understanding of designing/implementing network infrastructures. well-practiced in configuring protocols and technologies like PPP, PPPOE, OSPF, BGP,MPBGP, MPLS, ISIS, EIGRP, and VPN.

title: Cloud Computing
text: Worked as a cloud computing intern in Huawei Telecom in Dubai. During internship i worked on servers, storage and the network connection between them. i used fussion compute virtualization software for server virtualization and configured the virtual ports to allow communication between VMs when necessary. also have experience using AWS and Google Cloud services
